languages.text: "Заверяю вас, Первый офицер Версериан. Если мне понадобится что-то осмотреть, я не буду взламывать замки — я попрошу вас лично сопроводить меня".
"I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."
languages.original_text: "Заверяю вас, Первый офицер Версериан. Если мне понадобится что-то осмотреть, я не буду взламывать замки — я попрошу вас лично сопроводить меня".

traits.locale_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我向你保证，韦尔森大副。如果我需要检查什么东西，我绝不会私自撬锁，我会邀请你亲自陪同我一起去。”
languages.original_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."

traits.locale_text: “我向你保证，韦尔森大副。如果我需要检查什么东西，我绝不会私自撬锁，我会邀请你亲自陪同我一起去。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Permettez-moi de vous rassurer, second Werserian : si je dois inspecter quoi que ce soit, je ne m'amuserai pas à crocheter toutes les serrures sur mon passage. Non, je vous demanderai plutôt de m'escorter personnellement. »
languages.original_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi de vous rassurer, second Werserian : si je dois inspecter quoi que ce soit, je ne m'amuserai pas à crocheter toutes les serrures sur mon passage. Non, je vous demanderai plutôt de m'escorter personnellement. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich versichere Euch, Erster Offizier Werserian, wenn ich etwas inspizieren muss, dann knacke ich keine Schlösser — dann bitte ich Euch persönlich, mich zu eskortieren."
languages.original_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."

traits.locale_text: "Ich versichere Euch, Erster Offizier Werserian, wenn ich etwas inspizieren muss, dann knacke ich keine Schlösser — dann bitte ich Euch persönlich, mich zu eskortieren."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「約束しよう。ウェルザリアン副操縦士、俺が何かを検査する必要がある場合、鍵をこじ開けたりはしない。代わりにあなたにエスコートを頼む」
languages.original_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."

traits.locale_text: 「約束しよう。ウェルザリアン副操縦士、俺が何かを検査する必要がある場合、鍵をこじ開けたりはしない。代わりにあなたにエスコートを頼む」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Primer oficial Werserian, le aseguro que si necesito inspeccionar algo no recurriré a forzar cerraduras, sino que le pediré que me escolte personalmente».
languages.original_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."

traits.locale_text: «Primer oficial Werserian, le aseguro que si necesito inspeccionar algo no recurriré a forzar cerraduras, sino que le pediré que me escolte personalmente».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bana güvenin İkinci Kaptan Werserian. Eğer bir soruşturma gerekirse habersiz iş çevirmeye kalkmam. Bizzat iş birliği yapmak için size danışırım."
languages.original_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."

traits.locale_text: "Bana güvenin İkinci Kaptan Werserian. Eğer bir soruşturma gerekirse habersiz iş çevirmeye kalkmam. Bizzat iş birliği yapmak için size danışırım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I assure you, First Officer Werserian, if I need to inspect anything, I will not go about picking locks — I will ask you to personally escort me."
